rev.comment: internal link is a redirect to same page, so making an external one
rev.diff:
Line 61: Line 61:
* [[TurnKey Linux]] an open source project that aims to develop high-quality, installable [[Live CD]] [[software appliance | software appliances]] that are easy to deploy, easy to use and free. The project's motto is "everything that can be easy, should be easy".
* [[TurnKey Linux]] an open source project that aims to develop high-quality, installable [[Live CD]] [[software appliance | software appliances]] that are easy to deploy, easy to use and free. The project's motto is "everything that can be easy, should be easy".
* [[Ultimate Edition]] is an Ubuntu based distribution that is loaded with lots of software to make it an easier "out of the box" experience. It was previously called ''Ubuntu Ultimate Edition''.
* [[Ultimate Edition]] is an Ubuntu based distribution that is loaded with lots of software to make it an easier "out of the box" experience. It was previously called ''Ubuntu Ultimate Edition''.
â
* [[Ubuntu Christian Edition]] is an Ubuntu Package containing [[Christian]] based software. It is made for both [[Protestants]] and [[Catholics]].
+
* [http://www.christianubuntu.com/ Ubuntu Christian Edition] is an Ubuntu Package containing [[Christian]] based software. It is made for both [[Protestants]] and [[Catholics]].
* [[Ubuntulite]] is an Ubuntu based distribution with the main goal to be very light consuming hardware resources. The last version uses the [[LXDE]] desktop environment.
* [[Ubuntulite]] is an Ubuntu based distribution with the main goal to be very light consuming hardware resources. The last version uses the [[LXDE]] desktop environment.
* [[Ubuntu-Eee]] is an Ubuntu based distribution customized for the Asus Eee PC.
* [[Ubuntu-Eee]] is an Ubuntu based distribution customized for the Asus Eee PC.
